data.product_name: UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool - As Seen on Shark Tank - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat - Easy Tool for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (1 Pack, Aqua)

summary.topics: carseat, harness, lifesaver, arthritic, arthritis, granddaughter, seat, unbuckle, thumb, buckle, saver, daughter, baby, hand, grandma, nail, grandson, unbuckled, car, invention, button, strength, easier, kid, help, able, son, thank, child, mom, work, great, unbuckleme, very, her, best, awesome, this, recommend, use, difficult, device, easily, it, and really

price.review: Only giving this 4 stars bc of the price. Absolutely love the convenience of this clip. I have longer nails so this works perfectly. We keep this in our car seat and it is definitely a great purchase. I do think $15 is little much, but I would definitely gift it to anyone that has a child in a car seat.

My daughter is small for her age so we will probably be in a 5 pt harness for awhile. That said, she cannot push the release button and we have drop off at elementary school 5 days a week. This has been the solution to make that work. My only complaint is it seems a little pricey for what it is, but for us, its an essential tool so in the end its worth it.
Not very sturdy, kind of hard to use

I keep my nails done & always have had issues with the dang buckles! For the price I thought this would be great to try and it works perfectly! Only thing is that it is easy to forget to grab it if you're in a hurry and once you remember you forgot it  because you cracked a nail you are disappointed. The only thing that could make it better is if there were some strap or string - something - to hook it to the side of the seat so it's easily accessible at all times! I've started clipping mine to the seatbelt where it goes inside the carseat, but there could definitely be a better solution in production. Overall, I recommend & have purchased for my arthritic grandmother who babysits as well.

durable.review: Because of my acrylic nails, I had a hard time pushing the release button on my grandkids' carseats. This totally fixed that problem! I don't know how long it will last because I just got it, but it seems like it's pretty sturdy...

I bought this because I always had such a hard time pushing the button to undo my grandsons car seat! This product makes it so much easier! It is durable, and would make a great gift for new parents (or grandparents)!
My mother has arthritic thumbs and struggled to unbuckle my daughter. This has helped her tremendously. It is easy to use and seems very durable.
This thing does work, but my 5 year old still struggles a bit with it.
Looks really cheap, but it actually works!
Awesome product! Just bought this for my 4 year old and he loves it! Sturdy and easy to use. 10/10 recommend!
Amazing! I literally use it every day it the perfect tool!

Thank you for designing a simple item that helps those of us with arthritis! I have 4 grandchildren that I am regularly placing in and out of car seats. For the most part, no problem. But, for the occasional challenge to unbuckle, Unbuckable delivers! So, now I use it all the time! We shall see if the product durability maintains itself. Hoping that it does.
Where has this device been the last 9 years of carseats? Its brilliant and works like soft butter!!!  HIGHLY RECOMMENT!!!!!!

easy.review: This has been amazing for our 5 year old. It was very easy for her to learn how to use also.

Awesome, easy to use. My mother, who is in her mid-60s, has struggled to open the grand kids car seats for years. This product made it very easy. You just slide it around the buckle and push and it pops right open :) easy to just leave it sitting in the car alongside the base of the car seat
This simple gadget makes unbuckling my grandsons car seat a breeze!  No more fighting and struggling in pain to unbuckle the car seat.  The Best Invention Ever!
My 4 year old could easily unbuckle herself with this
Easy to use, my 5yo uses it to unbuckle himself and his 3yo brother when asked.

Havent worn long nails in a long time because of work. I work as a school bus driver and have babies in carseats on my route. My husband saw this and got it for me so I can go get my nails done and still be able to unbuckle the students. I love it! Very easy to use. And lightweight.
I had to show my 5 year old just once and he had it. Easy to use... great especially for grandparents and car seat installed in the back row of van!
Easy to use and easy on the thumbs

I had bought other items like this one hoping to help encourage my daughter to unbuckle herself since she will be moving to the 3rd row in our van. This was the only one to do the trick! It was so easy for her to use and was able to figure it out right away. Itll be such a big help when the new baby arrives so I dont have to hop into the 3rd row to get her out along with 2 little ones.
A pleasure to use because it works and is an easy application
This product make it easy for my 4 year old to get out of his own seatbelt when we give it to him. Helps during the independent phase of life.
My four year old learned how to use this to unbuckle himself pretty easily. Great tool for kids learning independence!
Inexpensive and effective and easy on the fingernails.

Makes getting my daughter in and out of her seat super easy and quick. No fussing around with the buckle. My hope is that when she gets a bit older shell be able to use it to get herself out. Happy with the purchase
My granddaughter loves it. She is a tiny girl for her age and would get frustrated because she has to wait for someone to help her. Well no more. This device is easy to use. She loves it.
So easy to use that my 6 year old with muscle weakness can now unbuckle herself!!!

It was very easy to use, even with arthritis and diminished strength in my hands. Opened the car seat button on the 1st try. I have tried a different style and struggled with that one. Should have bought 2.

My 5 year old daughter is very petite and cannot unbuckle her lower buckle. She absolutely loves this and being able to unbuckle herself... it is very easy for her to use and she was able to use it on the first try.

i nanny two young children and i like to have long acrylic nails. well its close to impossible to get their car seats unbuckled without breaking a nail. with this its easy peasy! just slide the buckle in between and push! super quick and no more broken nails. love it!
I like the color and easy to use. Thank you for thinking of this!
My child is able to use this to get himself unbuckled. Very convenient and easy to use. It would be helpful if it came with a string or tether of some sort to attach it to the carseat.
One push is all it takes!
Amazing easy, little effort and saved my nails!!

I originally got this for my friend (who loves long nails.) It was so easy to use I got two for myself. My then 5 & 6 year olds loved them. I'd hand them out when it was time to unbuckle. Super quick and they loved the independence. Worked well with our Saftey 1st, Graco and Britax harnessed booster seats
Works great.  Very easy to use.
Very easy to use. Great for the carpool line at school. My granddaughters can easily use it. Great for grandparents like me who have arthritis in our hands. I would definitely buy again.

This is my second Unbuckle Me. I thought I had misplaced the first one. I cant do without my Unbuckle Me so I got another one. I keep 5 grandkids- 4 of them are between 17 months and 2 years old. The other grand is 4 1/2. Unbuckle Me is so easy to use that he is my official unbuckler! When we arrive somewhere he gets all the babies unbuckled so we can unload quickly.
so easy to use
This is a very cool and easy to use procudt!
Easy to use. I got this for my mother who has been having a hard time unbuckling my nephew from his car seat. I recommend this to anyone who has a hard time getting babies/toddlers out of car seats.
easy to use
So easy to use! My four year old is so proud of his ability to unbuckle himself now! Planning to buy one for every vehicle!
Mom of 4. My eldest gets out of her seat and helps unbuckle her siblings. She loves the easy use and being able to get the kids out faster.
Easy to use
Made my 4 year old so much more independent. With ground rules its a simple get great invention! I ordered another one after for my mom just to make it easier for her to unbuckle my kids.
Super easy to use and unbuckles those buckles
I love mine, so easy with my long nails :)
So easy to use
Easy, simple and great!!

quality.review: This product works great! My 4 year old can use this to unbuckle herself from her Britax Boulevard so I dont have to climb into our third row to do it.
Love this!  I can now release my grandchild's buckle without severe pain!

I love this product. I have two grandsons and getting in and out of car seats was a chore and sometimes painful on my hands. This is SO easy to use and makes releasing so easy. Everyone should buy one for the grandma helping with the babies.
It works well. My wife was unable to open the buckle on our grandson's car seat before we got the unbuckle tool
Really effective product. Great for my painful thumbs.
Love this. Very easy to use. I would definitely recommend
She was very exited to receive it. She can't wait to try it out

My mother-in-law watches my infant son while we work, and was having problems unbuckling the baby seat. I  found this product, and purchased it for her. She says it works perfectly and has been helping her so much! A great find for someone who has a hard time pushing down on the buckles.
So comfortable and easy to use! Will not be painful to undo car seats anymore. Wish I would have found this a long time ago.
I bought this to use with my daughters special needs stroller.  The buckle has been hard open and this opens it in a snap!  Will recommend to others.
It doesnt work as easily as advertised. Its kind of awkward to use.
This product is great - easily unbuckle carseats and strollers. Wish it had a way to easily attach it to a keyring or something to stick to the carseat/keys etc because it's easy to leave behind.
Worked like magic, so easy for this Grandma with decreased hand strength.
Super great must have tool, specially for people with nails. Makes life so much easier and no more broken nails or hurting fingers!
Best invention!! Love this! I have horrible Rheumatoid arthritis and this is a lifesaver for my hands!! I bought 2!!
The best product since sliced bread.  Grandchild is now independent as she can unbuckle herself.  Saves me a headache.  Awesome product!!!
Absolute love this. Makes unclipping the car seat so easy!!!!I have arthritis in my hands and if I didnt have this tool I couldnt undo the car seat.  Very well made too.

I'm a first time Grandma in my early 50s & found carseat, swing, bouncey, etc much harder to open than what my kids had. Shortened my nails, but thumb arthritis made it impossible to apply even pressure & still worried about nails breaking. I watch my infant granddaughter on Fridays & was stuck staying home. Someone recommended I look for this on Amazon & it is really worth it! I keep it in the front seat cup holder & just toss it in my purse when needed. Baby & I now go everywhere! Color stands out, item is flexible, works great. I researched other brands & loved this was invented & made in the USA. Would be a great gift! Thx
I love this gadget!  I struggled to get my 4 year old granddaughter out of her car seat. With the Unbuckle Me, I can even hand it to her and she can do it herself!
This product has made it easy for my son to get out of his carseat buckle and also helps my older parents unbuckle him. So glad we purchased this!!!

This is a great workable item to unbuckle you child's car seat. Having arthritis I could not unbuckle it with out this device. Great gift for a new grama. Moms rely do not need it. They are strong. Would, and have recommend it to other  senior citizens. Nice pack-ageing. I keep mine in the pocket in back of the front seat, to big for a key chain.
This item is great for me because I have long nails. It makes it very easy to unbuckle my daughter from her car seat with out this I wouldn't be able to get her out.

This product, the UnbuckleMe, is AWESOME!!! With my mom having arthritic hands and me with my long nails, it makes it rather difficult to unbuckle the grandkids. Now with my new product, it's so much easier.  Thank you very much!!!
This product is awesome!  No more broken nails or sore fingers trying to undo my grandsons car seat
This is perfect for moms with long nails!!!

I bought this because my 4 year old has a hard time unbuckling her bottom buckle by herself. She tried it this morning and was so excited that she was able to get it undone without my help. Works great and gives her a little more independence! Its a little bigger than I expected but works great!
Great buy and easy to use. Purchased for the grandparents to use, it hangs off the car seat.
It really works!!!! So much easier to release the button on the car seats.
Very helpful
I could unbuckle my granddaughter's car seat much easier with the help of this tool. I would recommend it to anyone that has arthritis.
The best money Ive ever spent. Excellent for moms!

My wife has RA and unbuckling the babys car seat straps can be very difficult even for me. It is decent quality for what it is and for what its supposed to do. It creates some pressure on the fingers still but its much better than using your bare fingers to press the latch open.

I bought this at someone's recommendation and immediately loved it when my daughter was able to unbuckle herself from her seat. What an amazing invention! But then, less than 2 months after it was purchased, it just snapped right in half.  To be clear, the only person using it weighs 40 pounds and uses it like...2x a day, so there wasn't a lot of muscle required for the product to break easily. I'm really disappointed because I was sharing this product and singing its praises with my parent friends, and now it turns out the quality and durability are in serious question. Beware!
This product is amazing for people with long nails!
Probably the best thing I've bought in awhile! My daughter can now unbuckle herself in the backseat of the van. So nice! She will even help me unbuckle the other kids with this tool!

I purchased the UnbuckleMe after seeing it recommended by Car Seats for the Littles. My almost 5 year old has never been able to unbuckle himself from his carseat, as the crotch buckle simply requires more hand strength than he has. However, I really wanted him to be able to get himself out of his seat, as it makes things far easier and more convenient for me, especially when I've got a lot of things to get out of the car! But, despite my careful instruction and MUCH practice, my son still could not unbuckle himself. Enter the UnbuckleMe. I showed my son how to use it once, and then he used it to completely unbuckle himself from his carseat on the FIRST try! I was amazed! And he was so proud of himself. Now he unbuckles himself from the car every single time. It has made things easier and more convenient for me, and has also had the added bonus of giving my kiddo increased confidence and some much desired independence. Seriously, I can't recommend thus product enough. Worth every cent and then some!
It really works! My carpal tunnel is getting worse & this gets the buckle undone fast & easy everytime. When I couldn't get it undone before I was lugging the whole carseat around!
I bought this product because I wasnt able to press the release button with long acrylic nails. This tool is amazing. Havent had any issues.
This product performs as promised.  Prior to using it, I tried another device that was far inferior.  Would highly recommend it!
Amazing tool!!!
This was so perfect for both my daughter who is three so she can unbuckle herself, and my mom who has a hard time with unbuckling the grandkids!
Works great. Just what I needed!

I like the thinness if bottom plate makes easy to slide between strap and child. I was literally having the most difficult time getting button to release latch without this device it is ingenious invention. And it goes on my keychain so I can carry with me to all my grandkids car seats!!
I bought this for a friend with arthritis in her hands and had troubles with her grandson car seat... she said it is awesome! Very easy to use!
This works!! I love it and plan to buy another to keep on the other side of the car for 2nd grandchild!!

I loved this product but today after only a few months of use it broke and fell right off my keychain. I cant figure out how to contact the company other than leaving a review and I really hope they can help.
Useful

I bought this for my son to be able to unbuckle himself, and it's worked perfectly! When he went to visit extended family, it was a godsend for the arthritic hands trying to help unbuckle him. I can't say enough good about this product! Will be buying more in the future.
Great product! Would recommend it highly.

I ordered 3 different types of these devices and this was the best by far.  The slimness of the plastic made it easy to slip in place and the rubbery texture of the area where you press with your thumb made it the easiest and most effective of the ones i tested.  Highly recommend!  I ordered additional ones so there was one in every car.  I do wish it has a simple snap clip  (more than the deco one in gray) as I had to hunt for them.
The UnbuckleMe has been great for us. It allowed our 4 year old to get unbuckled without us having to crawl back to the 3rd row! I'd definitely recommend it.
Great buy.

My oldest daughter told me about this product. I am a 56 year old Memaw with Rheumatoid Arthritis and have had left thumb surgery. I have Fibromyalgia as well. This is an excellent tool. Very easy to use. Gentle squeeze and the carseat opens easily. I would definitely recommend this product.
This works really well. My four year old is able to unbuckle herself as we pull up to her school drop off so it makes drop off go faster.
Great product! My 5 year old can use it to unbuckle the harness-we just hand it back once the vehicle has stopped!

This is the best invention ever made! I was having a hard time unbuckling my toddlers car seat with my acrylic nails. I was breaking them or having to have my older child help. It was embarrassing. When I heard about this I thought Id give it a try and Im so glad I did!

I am so happy with this product. My baby granddaughter is relocating back home and since I will be seeing more of her, I decided to get this product. Having struggled with the buckles before, I am so happy to say this makes it so easy to unbuckle her from her seat. What a great invention!

So far, so good! We just got it last week so I really cant attest to the durability, but I gave 5 stars anyways. My daughter (almost 5) loves it! Shes been unbuckling anybody who will ask. She is old enough to know how to unbuckle herself in an emergency and can be trusted to only do it when told or when absolutely necessary. If her little hands can do it, anyone can!
I love this tool and is perfect for my mom when she keeps my baby and has to unbuckle her car seat.
I am a New mom with carpal tunnel and it was very easy to use.  To get my daughter out the car seat. Especially when traveling at the airport it can be attached to your keys.
I love this bc I could use my palm for pressure instead of my thumb.
Love it wish I had know about it earlier
Like
Not as easy to use as they show. Probably will get easier over time.
Love that we get to support a small business AND see our daughter do something independent and helpful. Great product, and no more frustrated tears in a rainy parking lot.
Works exactly as stated. Certainly helps this old grandma get the little guy out of his car seat. No more crabby toddler as grandma struggles. timely delivery, thank you.
Love this product. I use it to open two car seats multiple times a day with ease while having acrylic nails.
My very strong 5 year old could not work this. I could barely work it.
I love this product. Was able to get my grandbaby out of car seat in a flash. Awesome product
Just got this and used for the first time.  why have I not heard of this before! Absolutely AMAZING! So So So easy to use! Im recommending to everyone I know with a car seat!
This works amazingly well.  Recommend to anyone with dexterity issues.  Makes unbuckling so much easier for people with strength issues.  5 stars!!
Very convenient
I have a broken arm. This device was recommended by my physical therapist. Best purchase ever. You dont need a broken arm to benefit from using this device.

Since getting this it's much easier and quicker to get grandchildren out of car seat latch. My 5 y/o can do it by himself and 3 1/2 yr old needs minimal assistance.  Seems pretty sturdy and only had for a few weeks.
I love it! So easy to use. I will be ordering another one for my 80 year old mother to use in her car.
Very happy with this product, we've already ordered a 2nd one for my husband's vehicle. My 5 year old can easily use it to unbuckle herself.
Great to use for kids and me with long nails
My 4 year old granddaughter can buckle herself in but had trouble unbuckling herself. This makes it easier for her to do so. We had to buy a second one for my husbands car! This works great!

I was struggling with the car seat for my grandson. Between my nails and just being a little older, I really had a hard time unsnapping his car seat. This little device made it sooo easy that I honestly thought I had not snapped him correctly! Well worth it!!!!

Thank you so much for this wonderful product.  I had purchased something similar quite some time ago, but it didnt work, as I expected.  Now I can take my grandchildren places and be able to unbuckle their car seats.  I love this Unbuckle Me device.
Works like a champ! I purchased this as a gift for use with my new grandson. It was very easy for me to unbuckle the car seat using the device.
Amazing product. If you have arthritic fingers or hands, this is a must! No more car seat unbuckling struggles.
This unbuckleme product is amazing! I wish I would have had it years ago when my oldest grandchild was born. What a saver of strain and trouble. I am getting one for all of my friends

I never write Amazon reviews, but I had to for this. This product is absolutely incredible. My five-year-old can unstrap himself, which is very helpful so I dont have to climb in the third row of our car to get him out. I bought one for my two year old and I hand it to her when we get to our destination.
This thing is great! I have it on a separate keychain just for it and keep it in the door pocket so I can hand it back to my daughter when she needs it.
Well made and easy to use. My grandson loved the fact he didnt have to wait while I struggled to unbuckle him. Made sturdy enough to last a long time.

My 6 year old gets very frustrated thst he still can't unbuckle himself. This thing made him soooo happy! He no longer is at the mercy of others to help get him out. Thank you for this awesome. Little tool! I only wish I knew about it sooner!
This is an amaising tool

Yup! LOVE it! I feel safer knowing my child can get out on her own if need be. Smooth, sturdy, bouncy, plastic with grip rubber on one side. Exceeded our expectations  Love to support small business too! You go guys!
I purchased this for myself (Grandma with weak thumbs) but our 5 year old uses it with ease and can now completely unbuckle himself. Win-Win!
Its amazing so easy to use. And my 4 year loves being able to help unbuckle herself now
So easy to use. Not too big to store in the door pocket or under the car seat.
My mom has trouble with the car seat buckle but this product works easily to help her release it.
As a mom that likes having long nails this is an amazing product. Makes it so much easier to unbuckle my boys. No more chipped thumb nails

Its perfect!  We recently upgraded our kiddo to a car seat that stays in (as opposed to the infant one that clicks in and out), and the button is such a pain in the thumbs!  Not that were going much of anywhere with the pandemic and all, but those one or two times a month in the car are enough for me to look one of these up.  So glad I did!  Its almost effortless to unbuckle her now
The material is good but for me and my kids it is very hard to use. We totally unwrapped it so there is no chance for returning. I better had tried it before.
Great product , I am a grandmother who takes her grandson to school and I have difficult time unbuckling his seatbelt due to arthritis and this product has made it very easy and simple for me.

This product was recommended by other moms in my Parents Of Little People group on Facebook. Many of our children struggle with getting their car seats unbuckled by themselves. My six year old was still unable to unbuckle the bottom of his car seat. Used it this morning and it was easy! Very grateful since I have three kids and another on the way I dont have the wherewithal to unbuckle everybody!
Great product! Really works
Did not think this was going to be all that everyone said but oh my gosh I love it and its so easy to use End it does not hurt my hands

I am 74 and have had two thumb joint replacement surgeries.  Unbuckling my granddaughters car seat has been a challenge for more years than I can remember.  I hurt my thumbs and with great frustration ask for help.  I clamped this on as soon as it arrived and voila, the latch opened with ease.  Highly recommend.  I tied it to the car seat so it will always be at the ready!

I am so glad this grandma and daughter created this product.  I am able to get the grands out of their carseats now without having to hurt my hands. I have been worried about what I would do if I didn't have someone there to help me.  Thanks again, Ladies.
Love it. Easy to use

Purchased for mother-in-law to use during recovery from hand surgery. Effective and very easy to use. Gives me peace of mind knowing that my children will be buckled safely when traveling with grandparents and that unbuckling has been made easier as well.
Perfect for people who have acrylic nails.
I use this to unbuckle my sons car seat due to my long fingernails and it works great and fast.
I got this for my 4 year old because he couldnt get himself out of his car seat.  It worked great, he was able to use it on the first try all on his own.

This thing is amazing!!! I struggled constantly trying to unbuckle my granddaughter from her car seat. I couldnt push the release with my fingers. I ended up pushing and pushing it with my knuckles. With this, you just slip it over the button, push and it releases. Would definitely buy again. Highly recommended!
I love it super efficient for me since I have long nails
It works really good
Absolutely perfect for the mama that wants to have her nails done, but still be able to get her babies out of the car seat!
Love it works perfect
LIFESAVER!!!!!!! I cant say more just buy it you wont regret it!
My small 6yr old can finally feel good about still being in a harness bc he can unbuckle himself. And even helps with his little brother. Love this item!
I love this, its a little bulky and kind of hard to get on the car seat, but it is so much easier!
Yes this is awesome, especially if your fingernails are long. This has also made it easier for my 4 year old to unbuckle herself.
I dont have arthritis but it was nearly impossible for me to release the car seat latch for my new great granddaughter. The unbuckle me made it so easy. Great product!

This is the best thing to come along.  I struggled very much with getting my great grandson out of his car seat.  My hands would just not push hard enough to get the belt unhooked.  It caused me pain to finally get it open.  This little tool took that problem away.  I just slip under the buckle and use my full hand to push down and it opens easily.  So glad I tried it. I almost did not due to price but it is well worth it.
this changes the way  I care for my greatgrandson.  We now can go to the park

I am absolutely amazed by this product. My four-year-old loves it and loves being able to be a big boy and unclip himself. I keep it up front with me just in case I dont want him to ever try to unclip himself but I hand it to him and he gets to be a big boy.

Absolutely love this product!!!! Im the kind of mon who always has her nails done and on fleek! Usually theyre pretty long too so I struggle getting my son out of his car seat. This tool literally takes seconds to use and is so easy! Im so relieved knowing I wont have to break anymore nails trying to unbuckle his car seat
This is great for hands with arthritis and long nails

This works great for my 6 year old daughter. Her high backed booster has the harness, but the bottom buckle is super stiff. She couldn't get it. This works like a charm. She just keeps it in her cup holder.

I got this for 2 reasons. I'm getting a new car seat for my 2 month old and I know the buckle will be hard (graco 4ever) and my 6 yr old still uses a harness when in our second vehicle for sports and wanted him to be able to get himself out. Tried it on baby carrier and it was a dream. My 6 yr old was able to use it and loves it.
I was very happy to find that this buckle release works so well. It is easy to use and very handy. I keep it in my purse.
My three year old can use it. Helps my arthritic hands. A must have!
Loved this to help my child unbuckle herself and to really feel more independent!
I bought this for my mom, as she has a hard time getting the buckle undone on my son's car seat for her car. She loves it & says it's easy to use.
Wow!  Works GREAT!

Why did we wait so long to get this? Our son has been able to buckle himself for quite awhile and struggles to get that bottom buckle. This makes him more independent and proud! Now he can use it to unbuckle himself and others out of the car- win win!
This works great! My 4 year old uses it to unbuckle herself!

Grandma gets manicures. Grandmas hands dont work like they did when she was young. UnbuckleMe allowed me to pick up my grandson at daycare and unfasten him with no effort when I deposited him home. FANTASTIC!
Easy to use for the whole family. Have to buy another one to keep as backup and in my car and the other in my purse. For sure a great product!
Nothing much to say except this device is genius! It works perfectly!
The best couple dollars Ive spent yet!! Easy enough for my 5 year old to use! It's a sturdy little thing, and perfect size to throw in the armrest when not being used!
Tal cual lo ordenado

My 4 yr old son and I love this. I hand this to him when we park and he actually uses it to unbuckle himself. He gets to be a big boy! I purchased it because I get so behind doing mom things that I cant get my nails done for weeks sometimes. I keep them very short or I cant function- definitely cant unbuckle a car seat when they grow out. 100% recommend this genius tool.
This is an amazing tool. We got it for my almost 5 year old to help her unbuckle herself for kindergarten drop off and she got it after 2 tries.
My child loves this and the fact hes a big boy and doesnt have to have mom helping him get out of the car seat! It helps me out a lot too!

I bought this buckle release tool to help my son get unbuckled in car call line at school.  Parents are supposed to stay in vehicle so this has been awesome.  My son has no trouble using it at all, he just turned 6.  If you have escapees just keep it up front and hand it back to them when needed, otherwise they can keep them in cubby hole in car seats or back of seat organizers.
This has made it possible for my 5 year old to get out of her buckles on her own.

carseat.review: Works pretty well. Its mai ly for my 3 year old to get herself unbuckled since her baby brother's will be coming very soon. So far it works, but with a little effort sometimes. Its important to note we have a Chicco nexfit that has a VERY stubborn buckle to begin with.

My 4 year old wanted to be able to unbuckle himself from his car seat by himself but his thumbs are not quite strong enough. This tool doesnt make it easier for him to use his hands but he has figured out how to put it on, squeeze it and use his pelvis to pop the buckle off and that makes him super proud
My four year old struggles to unbuckle his car seat. This allows him to unfasten himself most of the time.

I got new car seats for both of my kids and they are much harder to unbuckle than the old ones which frustrated my 3 year old who is used to being able to unbuckle on his own. This absolutely solved the problem he loves it
It has been a challenge to unbuckle my grandson from his car seat, but Unbuckle Me makes this task incredibly easy!
My special needs grandson is now able to unbuckle his own car seat.  Awesome!!
I finally had a chance to use my Unbuckle Me! I love it. I struggled opening my grandsons car seat and now its a breeze! I am so glad I learned about this from the lady who does my nails.
It was too big. And the mouth didnt make it easy to put into the car seat buckle. It didnt come with a string or a keychain.
My granddaughters no longer panic that I might not be able to get them out of their car seats.
My preschooler can unbuckle himself in carpool now.

It was a small learning curve in the beginning how exactly it works with our car seat, but it helps tremendously if you dont have much hand strength. Even my 4 year old can do it when I hand them the clip so I dont have to stand in the elements.
My 4 year old loves that she can get out of the car seat by herself now!
This worked great to unlatch childs car seat safety buckle. Really helps if you lack hand strength or have arthritis.

This little gadget is great for this old lady lacking strong thumbs, but still having the need to use a car seat for a grand-baby.  It is a bit of a trick to fit it around the buckle in our car seat, which is the only reason I deducted a star.  I am so glad I found it!!
I'm glad I can now get my granddaughter out of her car seat without injury to myself or her!
This product barely fits on the seat belt button....I have to stretch it open to get it to fit...might just be the type of car seat I have.  But it does work easily once its in position.

Bought 2 to try.  Keep one near my youngest son's carseat to use for myself and the 2nd my autistic 6year old keeps in cupholder next to his seat. He loves the independence of being able to get out of his seat (only after I tell him it's ok) on his own. Buying more for gifts to aunts and grandparents!
Still hard for my mom to unbuckled the car seat, but A LOT easier.
This helps me due to me having difficult with the car seat buckles. I am thinking about ordering another one.
Use this to get my grandson out of his car seat.  I have RA so this is such a big help!

Great for adults to use to unbuckle car seat but wasn't as helpful for school age kids to be able to unbuckle themselves. I had hoped that kids could use it instead of having to twist around to help them get out in carpool line.
My mom has bad arthritis in her hands and shes able to easily unlatch my sons Britax car seat with this

My granddaughter has a car seat that is so protective it's hard to get her out of it.  :) I had to use both thumbs at the same time to release the main latch, but this "tool" helps me easily release it. It took a couple minutes to figure out how to use the Unbuckle correctly, but now that I have, it will be a helpful assist!
We used it a few times and it broke right in half. I loved it and loved the idea of it when we got it but it's not as sturdy as I it would be
Got it for my mother as she watches my son while Im working and has a hard time with the unbuckle part of the carseat . she says she loves it and helps her so much.
Makes it so much easier getting grandson out of carseat
This has been such a great thing for me to unbuckle to car seat with when I have a nails done!!
I have a Disney carseat for my great grandson.  I don't really like the car seat, it is very hard to adjust and unlock.  This Unbuckleme does not open wide enough to get around the latch.

Bought this to help my 4.5 year old unbuckle her Graco tranzitions car seat. Unfortunately the product does not open wide enough to go over the buckle to allow her to use it. You need to yank it open a bit to get it on and she cant do that.

harness.review: My five year old struggled to unbuckle buckle his 5 point harness booster seat straps and would get very upset about it when we would drop him off at the kiss and go and school. With this neat little contraption he has taken control and can now get himself out of the car. Loved it so much we now have one in each car!
I want to keep my 5-year-old harnessed a bit longer. He can unbuckle himself, except that bottom buckle. I showed him how to use it once, and he has no problem using it with his Graco Atlas. Thanks!

This is a great idea & it would work better for me if it would maneuver better on the buckle. I have the 5 point harness Evenflo booster & the buckle is a little thicker so it takes a little bit longer to pry this open wider so it will fit on the buckle. My daughter sitting in the booster cannot use this. It takes too long for her to get it on the buckle. Hopefully after a lot more uses it will be easier & faster to use.
Works great. My oldest two are way in the back with 5 point harnesses. This makes it so much easier for them to get out. They are 3 and 4.

Perfect to keep in your vehicle or keychain if you have a 5 point harness for one or more children. Purchase one for each family member especially grands, so that they dont have a hard time opening that bottom connection. No more broken nails nor sore fingers!
I use this because of my nails but its kind of a struggle to get it around the thick harness that its intended for.

lifesaver.review: I am a grandma who has been struggling with the car seat buckle until  I found this.  Now i can release my grandson from his seat quickly and without breaking a nail.  thank you!!  great invention.

Works great. My 5 year old is able to unbuckle himself and his younger brother when we stop and it saves alot of time and no having to stretch across the car in the school drop off line. He loves being able to do it himself.
What a lifesaver

Battling that dreaded red button to get my infant in and out of his car seat has been really difficult since our first trip home from the hospital. Id press many times over to get him out before the button would finally release. The unbuckle me has become a life-saver and a time saver. The rubberized grip makes it easy to hold onto and pressing the clip is a breeze. I actually was pressing it too hard initially thinking I needed more force. Once I got the hang of it, the clip requires little force to complete its task. I wish I bought this months ago. This is my new go-to gift for baby showers now.
It makes getting my grandkids out of their car seats much quicker and much easier!
What a lifesaver! This is the best invention for anyone with any kind of wrist, hand issues!

AMAZING! My 4.5 year old figured it out right away and can now unbuckle his car seat easily when we arrive at school. Wish I would have discovered this sooner & saved myself lots of climbing into the backseat of the car.
This is a lifesaver!!! I have 3 kids 4 years old and younger. My 4 year old figured it out after only two tries.
I am so glad to have found this! Arthritis in my hands made getting grandchildren out of car seats a painful struggle. UnBuckleMe was easy to use and painless!  Highly recommend!
What an amazing tool! A life saver for thumb joint arthritic pain!!!
Love this product. I wear fake nails and this is a life saver (and a nail saver lol) very easy to unbuckle.

I had just got acrylic nails and was having difficulty with my sons carseat. This thing is a miracle worker! I have two boys under the age of 2 so this works great! I don't have to worry about getting my nails done as long as I have this. I would recommend!

My kids are old enough to be able to unbuckle themselves from thier 5-point harness, but don't yet have the strength to be able to do so.  This product has made it so much easier on all of us; the kids unbuckle themselves and my spouse and I don't have to crawl into the back of the van to do it for them.  The kids love the independence of being able to get out of their seats all by themselves. You do have to get the position of the "Key" exactly right, but once you do it works like a charm.  took the kids a few days to try it out before being successful.  I imagine an adult could figure it out even more quickly.

I struggled with getting my grandbabies out of their car seats for years!  I have acrylic nails and it was VERY difficult!  Not anymore!  The unbuckle me makes it SOOOO easy  and painless!!!  Thank you!  I'm giving one to my daughter in law!

Thank You..Thank You...you made my life so much easier,,Having 4 grandchildren, all under the age of  2, equals a lot of car seats.  I have struggled with those .. I could never get that middle, in between the legs unbuckled.. but now I can.. what a fabulous tool.
I have long nails so this helps a thousand!

I NEVER do reviews!!...until I received this order this has been so useful! Its very easy to use and makes unbuckling my toddlers car seat very easy! Would totally recommend to anyone looking to make it easier!!

Why didn't I purchase this item sooner!!  My twin boys are 5 years old and are small enough to continue using their 5 point harnesses.  It's been a struggle to constantly climb into our vehicles to Unbuckle them.  Well thanks to the Unbuckle Me, we haven't had to do it for over 2 weeks.  I would definitely recommend this to mom's that have children ready to unbuckle themselves.
Love it!  My only suggestion is that it needs to be a little smaller. Its definitely too large for a keychain which they advertise it for but aside from that, its saved my nails.

I have arthritis in my hands and thumbs.  This UnbuckleMe is a lifesaver. I was unable to unbuckle my grandchild from the car seat or anything that had a harness.  Big problem.....but no more. This is easy to use and works great. Well made and durable.

I was panicking about my 5 year old not being able to get out of his car seat for school drop off and someone mentioned these to me. I had no idea they existed but they are LIFESAVERS! My son figured it out on the first try and was able to unbuckle his little brother too!! This saved me so much stress and is keeping my son harnessed (and safer) for longer in his car seat.  Highly recommend!!

Your browser does not support HTML5 video. BEST INVESTMENT EVER ! You may wonder if a simple piece of plastic is worth $15, but when your 4 year old is in the wayyyyyy back of your third row mini van , and its 110 outside , and your left with the choice of sweating to death while doing yoga poses to release your oh so precious child from their life saving device OR just leaving them in there and hoping for the best .... it saves you from being the summer statistic in car fatalities . Worth the buy !
This is a lifesaver! I have long nails & dont have to worry about struggling to get the car seat open! Best gadget out there

My son struggles with opening his buckle on his own and he needs to for carpool this year. This is a life saver he can do it on his own now super quickly. It makes him so happy to be able to do it on his own.
I havent been able to undo a car seat for some time due to RA. This tool works great. Now I feel comfortable in taking grandchildren places!

This makes it SO easy to unbuckle a car seat and I no longer have to worry about always breaking my nails! Great product for anyone with arthritis, hand pain, acrylic nails, or any other difficulty unbuckling their kids!
I have recently sprained my wrist and am not able to squeeze hard enough to unbuckle my kiddos. Im thankful for this tool, it helps SO MUCH! Thank you!
This made all the difference for my son and enabled him to unbuckle himself. It's also great for adults in our family who have long nails or poor hand strength.

I always felt foolish having trouble unbuckling my granddaughter from her car seat, and this little gem of a device has now made it a breeze to unbuckle her. Thank you from a very grateful grandmother.

I started to dread trying to unbuckle my great granddaughter.  Now I get her unbuckled with ease and no pain in my fingers or hands!  Thank you for your wonderful invention!  You should market these to the car seat manufacturers and they should include one with every car seat sold.
I was really having a hard time releasing the buckles on my granddaughter's car seat. This does the trick!
This thing is a lifesaver. I have bad dexterity and hand strength and cant always get the car seat unbuckled. With this I have no problems and my 3.5 y/o can actually do it herself as well!

Love it. No more struggling to get my grandson out of his car seat. I have arthritis in my thumbs for several years so it would be very difficult and my not yet two year old grandson would try to help.

I saw this product on "SHARK  TANK". It proved to be a great investment for the Shark and an invaluable tool for me. I am 80 years old and reasonably healthy. Often, I would not take my small grand kids in my car because I could not release their child seats buckles without a bystander's help. Now, with this magic tool, I can  UNBUCKLE their seats easily. Thank you.
I'm a monitor on a special needs Pre-K bus and this item has saved my thumbs!! So easy to use and seriously, no bent thumbnails this year!! Thank you so much!
This is a game changer for anyone with arthritic hands.  Practice without baby in seat/stroller.
Got this for Grandma to help with seatbelt removal when she has our daughter.  It has been a big help.
My 5 year old daughter loves using this to unbuckle herself. After having another baby it was hard for me to unbuckle her sometimes. This is the perfect solution
This is a lifesaver! My 4 year old can unbuckle herself if needed. Very easy to use!
This is a lifesaver to my mom when unbuckling my 2 year old from her car seat. She raves about it all the time!
My 5 year old granddaughter can unbuckle herself without any trouble.  Major time saver
Love this!!  Car seat buckles are no longer a problem.
As a Yaya with my first grandchild this product is a lifesaver. Ive tried similar, and less expensive tools and they just didnt work. For anyone with RA, I highly recommend this product.
I recently had shoulder surgery and didnt have the strength/mobility in one hand to unbuckle the little ones seat.  This has been a life saver! Highly recommend .
UNBUCKLE ME IS ABSOLUTLY NESESARY, IT MAKES RELEASING A CHILD FROM A CAR SEAT POSSIBLE TO MANY PEOPLE LIKE ME THAT HAVE NO FINGER STRENGHT FABULOUS PRODUCT!!!!

So glad I bought this.  I developed thumb pain in the hand I use to unbuckle the car seat.  The pain started a bit after I began taking care of my grandson.  Pressing down on the buckle to get the straps unbuckled was impossible.  I was worried I wouldn't be able to take him out by myself for fear of him getting stuck in the seat. This product makes it SO EASY.  I slide it on the buckle, use my palm to lightly press down, and the  buckle pops open! No need to use my thumb, and no pain!  Purchased the light blue so I can easily find it in my car.  Highly recommend.

Being a grandmother of several children who are still in car seats, I have struggled for so long to unbuckle them, especially on very cold days. There were many times I was frustrated at my inability to press hard enough to release that red button. I saw an ad on the web for this amazing product and purchased Unbuckle Me. It is life changing - I have bought one for all my "Grandma" friends.

I love this UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool! I use to struggle for 5 minutes or more to get my baby out of his car seat AND his stroller. Pushing down on the buckle would cause me lots of thumb pain and even wrist pain but not anymore! I can even use it on the Graco stroller which was even worse than trying to undo the car seat buckle....nothing like a crying baby and a buckle that wont unclip to make the stress level go up.  This tool makes it quick, easy and painless to get the buckles undone. So easy my preteen actually asks to help get baby in and out of the cars eat and stroller now. Need to order a second one!

Life changing product for someone with long nails!!! I broke my acrylic thumb nail while pushing the button on my child's carseat (lots of bleeding and trauma to the nail). Looked for a better solution and found this gem! Never knew something this simple could save my nails!
My Kindergartner don't have the finger strength to unbuckle herself.  School drop off lane does not allow parents to get out of the car.  These worked great and was a lifesaver!

I love this tool.  Makes a horrible task so much easier!  My thumbs have such arthritis and this is a life saver for me!!  Now if only someone could make Auto-closing lightweight strollers a grandma would love!  :) Thank you for the Unbuckle me!  It's perfect!

This product is a game changer for people with long nails. I used to struggle with that stupid middle button. My daughter would have a meltdown while I fumbled with the button, trying to unbuckle it with my knuckles or risk breaking a nail. This has changed my life. Buy it.
Made opening and removing my twins so easy! Saved my nails! Even they can get themselves out!
This was great, I dont normally get my nails done and I did not thinking about having to get the kids out of the car. This was a total life saver.

Our 5 year old hasn't been able to push the red button in hard enough to unbuckle herself when getting out of the car for preschool. But now with this, she does it with ease! We bought one for each car :)

Im pregnant with baby #3 and had to move my almost 5 year olds car seat to the 3rd row in my car. It was a pain trying to reach her myself to unbuckle her car seat and now that Im 9 months pregnant I couldnt climb back to the 3rd row even if I wanted to. Now with the UnbuckleMe, life is sooo much easier. She figured out how to use it in 2 seconds. I talked to her about not playing with the UnbuckleMe and to only use it when I told her to get unbuckled. So far we havent had any problems.

My 4.5 year old can finally unbuckle himself! My first boy never had this problem and could do it from the age of 3. My 4.5 year old just cannot do it and now he can! It makes life with 3 kids just a tad easier.

So incredibly useful!  I have 2 kids in the  3rd row in an SUV, I just throw this across the car and they unbuckle themselves! The 4-year-old struggled a bit to figure it out the first few times but with practice he got it down. Very much recommended for parents of kids 3-4 and up. Time saver!
Game changing gadget for me - the struggle is over and can now travel alone with grands  Only had it two days and love it, rated durability 3 only because haven't had it long enough to know
My 3.5 yr old is able to unbuckle herself all by herself which is helpful when shes in the 3rd row and Im trying to get her twin infant brothers out of the car and in the stroller.
makes my life easier

arthritic.review: Perfect for those of us that have any arthritis in our hands.  I purchased a car seat for my grand daughter so I could pick her up and return her to mamma. Sadly, I was not able to get her out of the seat due to rheumatoid arthritis.  But now with the Unbuckle Me tool, it's so easy!  Finally can help the new mamma by picking up my oldest grand daughter:)

This product does exactly what it says it will do- help me EASILY unlock the car seat tab.  I love it!  I have arthritis in my thumbs and this simple device just popped the button open so fast and with very little pressure, I could not believe it!  Congrats to the "maker"

This is exactly what I was looking for to unbuckle my grandson's car seat! I have very bad arthritis in both hands and can't unbuckle a child's car seat by myself. With UnbuckleMe, I can take my grandson to lots of fun places without the fear of not being able to get him out of his seat. This product is so simple to use and is a dream! Thank you UnbuckleMe!

I pick up my grandson from nursery school every Wednesday and was having a hard time releasing the button on the car seat. I have arthritis in my hands and couldn't press down on the button release hard enough. My daughter ordered the UnbuckleMe to help with this issue. It works perfectly! I love it! Thank you.

This was sooooo helpful in releasing the car seat harness especially because I have arthritic thumb joints!  My grandson (age5) can also use it which means I dont gave to any more.  Ive been so concerned before getting this as to what would happened if I had to get the grandchildren out of the car because of an accident. The concern is still there but not as great as it was !

This is such a helpful product! I have 5 grandchildren under the age of five and I have them in the car with me often. My hands, especially my thumbs are getting worse as I get older and unbuckling carseats was very difficult and painful until I tried this handy device.  It is very easy to use and I recommend it to anyone with arthritis or other hand issues.
Works great for grandma as she has arthritis and cannot do the carseat without help
Just what I needed to help my arthritic fingers push that darned red button to release the harness.
Love, love UnbuckleMe!! Perfect for this gramma with thumb arthritis!! Three grandkiddos!

Thank you thank you thank you!!!!! Your product is AMAZING!!!!!  I have arthritis in my thumb and found it so painful and difficult to manage my grandsons car seat buckle. I cant believe how easy your Unbuckle Me is to use and how effective it is!!! I too am an OT and applaud your creativity in developing such a wonderful solution! My thumbs and I thank you!!!

I had the same problem as the inventor. I'm a grandmother with arthritis in my thumbs. I've always had a difficult time on buckling my grandchildren. With this little device, it's 10 times easier. No pain and they're out immediately. Love it and thank you for inventing!

I   this product.  I hsve arthritis and lymphodema in my hand.  Its very difficult to unbuckle my grandkids.  This tool is very soft and smooth on the outside.  I love the loop so I can attach it to my car.  I did not like the sharp burrs on the inside, someone needs to pay attention to quality control.

I bought this for my sisterinlaw who takes care of her granddaughter occasionally. She used it yesterday for the first time and was happy to say that it made unbuckling the car seat restraint buckles sooooo much easier on her arthritic fingers...

"Unbuckle Me was invented by a Grandma with thumb arthritis" That's my situation too. Not only did I need help unbuckling on a regular basis I was concerned that in an emergency situation I would not be able to get my grandchild out of the car seat! Not anymore Unbuckle Me works! Thank you

I love it! And appreciate the invention. Both my mother and I have arthritis and carpo tunnel and to top it off my daughters car seat buckle was just so hard to open. Now theres times where I dont have to use the unbuckle me. I do prefer using it just because it doesnt make my hand nor thumbs hurt.  Its a little thick but sturdy. Thank you for creating an item so useful.
With arthritis those car seat buckles are impossible, then baby is crying while I struggle with the button.  This makes it so much easier, and my boy doesnt have to wait!  Thank you!
This works great when I do my nails to get my kiddo out of his seat. He likes to help unbuckle himself too. Im going to show my MIl so she doesnt have to struggle with her arthritis.

arthritis.review: Perfect for my mom with thumb arthritis!
Was really excited to find this for my mom who has rheumatoid arthritis. Broke after a few uses.

I was so happy to find this. Stroller buckles are the hardest for me. I got to try this today and it worked like a charm. I have  Rheumatoid  arthritis and sometimes my hands just don't work. This worked though!
I have bad rheumatoid arthritis in my hand and as a nanny of 30 years I couldn't undo car seats. With this product... easy peasy no problems
Perfect for a grandparent with artheritis.

review_types.best_review: I purchased the UnbuckleMe after seeing it recommended by Car Seats for the Littles. My almost 5 year old has never been able to unbuckle himself from his carseat, as the crotch buckle simply requires more hand strength than he has. However, I really wanted him to be able to get himself out of his seat, as it makes things far easier and more convenient for me, especially when I've got a lot of things to get out of the car! But, despite my careful instruction and MUCH practice, my son still could not unbuckle himself. Enter the UnbuckleMe. I showed my son how to use it once, and then he used it to completely unbuckle himself from his carseat on the FIRST try! I was amazed! And he was so proud of himself. Now he unbuckles himself from the car every single time. It has made things easier and more convenient for me, and has also had the added bonus of giving my kiddo increased confidence and some much desired independence. Seriously, I can't recommend thus product enough. Worth every cent and then some!
review_types.worst_review: This product is a game changer for people with long nails. I used to struggle with that stupid middle button. My daughter would have a meltdown while I fumbled with the button, trying to unbuckle it with my knuckles or risk breaking a nail. This has changed my life. Buy it.
review_types.neutral: She was very exited to receive it. She can't wait to try it out
